canGoIn: Household waste is anything that cannot be:
placed in your green waste bin.
Hard plastics containers that cannot be scrunched (even if it doesn't have a plastic ID number inside)
Milk and juice cartons (including liquid paper, Tetra Pak)
Aluminium and steel cans, trays, aerosols, pots and pans Scrunch foil into a ball
canNotGoIn: Clothing, linen, shoes and soft toys
Hazardous materials,including batteries,gas bottles, oil and paint

prodcuts.name: Aerosol cans (empty, not fuel or paint)
Aluminium foil (scrunched cricket sized ball) and trays
Animal waste (bagged)
prodcuts.canIRecycleThis: Put in your general waste bin
